pilots.name: Arvel Crynyd
pilots.caption: Green Leader
pilots.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. If you would fail a [Boost] action by overlapping another ship, resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Green Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its sensitive controls and high maneuverability, only the most talented pilots belong in an A-wing cockpit.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Jake Farrell
pilots.caption: Sage Instructor
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a [Focus] action.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Phoenix Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Led by Commander Jun Sato, the brave but inexperienced pilots of Phoenix Squadron face staggering odds in their battle against the Galactic Empire.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Wedge Antilles
pilots.caption: Promising Pilot
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Sabine Wren

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the enemy ship's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.
pilots.caption: Daughter of Mandalore

pilots.name: Hera Syndulla

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Phoenix Leader
pilots.ability: While another friendly ship at range 1-2 defends or performs an attack, during a Modify Dice step, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens, evade tokens, or locks to that ship.

pilots.name: Ahsoka Tano

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Fulcrum
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 and spend 2 [Force]. That ship may perform an action, even while stressed.

pilots.name: Shara Bey

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Green Four
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Derek Klivian

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Hobbie
pilots.ability: After you acquire or spend a lock, you may remove 1 red token from yourself.

pilots.name: Keo Venzee

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Auspicious Ace
pilots.ability: If you have no active [Force], after you reveal a bank [[Bank Left] or [Bank Right]] or turn [[Turn Left] or [Turn Right]] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, perform that maneuver as a sideslip and recover 1 [Force].

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Son of Alderaan
pilots.ability: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may perform actions, even while stressed.
